title: This Month's GTA+ Benefits
headline: This Month's GTA+ Benefits
subtitle: GTA+
content:
In addition to the recurring monthly GTA$500,000 deposited directly into your Maze Bank account, GTA+ members who've signed up for this month (June 6 - June 24) will also receive:

— An extra bonus of GTA$1,000,000 every month through August
— The Bravado Greenwood (Muscle)
— Exclusive clothing
— 2X GTA$ and RP on Short Trips
— 50% off Agency Properties and their Upgrades & Modifications
— And more

Membership automatically renews monthly, cancel anytime. Visit rsg.ms/gtaplus for more info.
